short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract frames from MP4 and MOV video files.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HD Media Extractor is a powerful and user-friendly Google Chrome extension that allows you to capture and save frames from video files with ease. Whether you want to extract a still image from a video for personal use or professional purposes, HD Media Extractor provides a seamless solution.

Key Features:

Video Upload and Preview: Easily upload video files (MP4 and MOV formats) and preview them directly within the extension.

Frame Capture: Capture high-quality frames from videos with a single click.

Save Captured Frames: Save the captured frames as PNG images to your device.

User-Friendly Interface: A clean and intuitive layout that makes frame extraction and saving straightforward.

Real-Time Status Updates: Get real-time feedback and status updates throughout the process.

Download HD Media Extractor today from the Chrome Web Store and start capturing your favorite frames from videos quickly and easily!
